verbs.description: at least 2 000 children [V: have] been separated from their parents at the us - mexico border since the trump administration enacted a no - tolerance policy for migrants attempting to cross the us - mexico border ice has separated at least 2 000 children from their parents who are now in separate detention centers several groups are working to support them rocky mountain immigrant advocacy network young center for immigrant childrens rights michigan immigrant rights center united states department of homeland security northwest immigrant rights project american civil liberties union texas civil rights project refugee and immigrant center for education and legal services legal aid justice center houston immigration legal services collaborative
